name: Hadrosaurus

action.name: Tail
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

description:
A hadrosaurus is a semi-quadrupedal herbivore recognizable by its bony head crests. If raised as a hatchling, it can be trained to carry a Small or Medium rider.
Source: Volo's Guide to Monsters p. 140, Tomb of Annihilation
